markdownRemark.html:
This post is part of an ongoing series in which I document my journey through the COVID-19 quarantine. See Day 1 for full context.

Quick update

After almost 3 months writing on DEV, I just hit 2 milestones: Reached 1K followers and 10K reads on 1 post. Not my most loved one but the one with more reach.

I also kept working on logo quiz. I kept braing warming and it’s working wonders. Feeling a lot more productive, improving focus and getting things done.
